mean_en: a monarchy in northwestern Europe occupying most of the British Isles; divided into England and Scotland and Wales and Northern Ireland
short_phrase: the flag of the United Kingdom (UK)
sentence: The United Kingdom means England, Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
sentence_trans: 英国包括英格兰、威尔士、苏格兰和北爱尔兰四个地区。
